testcase.name: Testing the selecting the seat of bus in MakeMyTrip
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the MakeMyTrip.............................................passed When User clicks on the bus.................................................passed And User enters the fromcity................................................passed And User enters the destination city........................................passed And User selects the date...................................................passed And User clicks on the search button........................................passed And User redirected to bus list page........................................passed And User selects the preferd bus............................................passed And User selcts the pickup and drop point locations.........................passed And User click on the continue button.......................................passed And User redirected to the complete your booking page.......................passed And User fills the personal detils..........................................passed And User clicks on the continue button......................................passed Then User is redirected to Payment page.....................................passed
